## SDR Checklist
- [ ] CLAIMS.yml updated (atomic, prioritized)
- [ ] Each claim has >= 2 evidence rows in EVIDENCE.csv
- [ ] Evidence includes quote + date_accessed + strength
- [ ] REPORT references claim_id(s) like [C1]
- [ ] Counterevidence / uncertainty addressed
- [ ] Validator passes (`python scripts/validate_project.py <project>`)
